scripts.backend: cd backend && set NODE_ENV=development&& set JWT_SECRET=foiyfoshi_secret_key_2024&& set JWT_EXPIRE=30d&& set PORT=5000&& set MONGO_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/foiyfoshi&& node server.js
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy:check: npm run build:frontend && echo Production build completed successfully
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf build && cd ../backend && rm -rf uploads && mkdir uploads
